altername_name: Adventure Time: Finn und Jake auf Spurensuche
name: Adventure Time: Finn and Jake Investigations
overview: It's Time to Crack Some Cases! Adventure Time: Finn & Jake Investigations ia an all-new, story-driven 3D adventure game. Strange stuff is happening in the Land of Ooo (stranger than usual anyway). Luckily Finn and Jake are on the case! This mysterious adventure will put their detective skills to the test as they search for clues, interrogate witnesses and piece together the evidence to save the day. They might even have to bust up a few goons along the way, but it's nothing that Finn & Jake Investigations can't handle!
